projects.name: GOshop
projects.about: GOshop is a full-stack mock online store. Users can create an account, log in, post items, and add items to their cart. The project was developed using ReactJS, Node.js, MongoDB, and is hosted using Heroku.

projects.name: Vaporwave website
projects.about: This project is a website detailing the popular music microgenre 'vaporwave'. It includes a music player made with jQuery which allows users to load and play songs mentioned throughout the content of the website.

projects.name: Conway's Game of Life
projects.about: An implementation of John Conway's Game of Life using ReactJS and Node.js.

projects.name: A Compiler for Jasonelle
projects.about: A compiler for creating JS-based web applications from Jasonelle.
